item.description:
This is an easy 3.5 mile walk on wide flat trail though scenic woods, beach and meadow. I hope that with enough notice lots of members old and new will make this walk. We will meet in the parking lot at 9 am rain or shine. Bring some water, plastic bags and perhaps a towel so you can clean off your tired wet dogs before putting them back in the car.

The entrance to the park is across from the Hingham commuter train station on Fort Hill

Please make a big effort to make this our largest walk ever!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be waiting inside the gate about 200 feet in with a large black lab, a schipperkee and a black lab puppy

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Bare Cove Big Pack walk
